transcript: You don't know what drives them. They don't give a name or ask question They just turn as one and start the swim that brings them here To this place where we stand for a massive celebration of sex and death Oh, man, I'm giving myself a goof bumps. Oh my hairs are popping up

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: They don't know what drives them.  They don't give it a name or ask a question.  They just turn, as one, and start the swim that brings them here; to this place, where we stand, for a massive celebration of sex and death.  Oh, man, I'm giving myself goose bumps.  All my hairs are popping up.
